items.titolo: I used these viral Gemini prompts to find the cheapest flight possible - here are the results
items.descrizione: I tried 20 popular Gemini prompts to find the safest, cheapest way to fly my family to Florida later this year. Gemini gave me surprisingly specific guidance.
